about_the_game:
Game description:

Princess Rhapsody is a simulation business adventure game that combines traditional aesthetics and leisure fun. Players will travel to an elevated ancient world to experience the tranquility of pastoral life and the thrill of adventure. Experience different storylines with different female characters，No extra patches required for a seamless experience

【 Joy of planting 】

In the game, the player will have a fertile land, can grow a variety of ancient crops, such as rare spiritual grass, colorful rice and so on. Through careful care, witness the whole process of crops from sowing to harvest, and enjoy the fun of farming life.

【 Leisurely fishing 】

Rivers and lakes are rich in aquatic life, players can hold a simple fishing rod, leisurely fishing on the picturesque shore. There are different kinds of fish in different waters, and there are even legendary spirit animals waiting to be discovered, adding infinite surprises to the fishing trip.

【 Treasure hunt 】

The ancient world hides countless undiscovered treasures, and players will embark on a treasure hunt based on ancient clues and maps. Traversing dense forests, exploring ancient tombs and solving puzzles, each step is full of unknowns and challenges, collecting rare treasures and unlocking the secrets of history.

【 Ancient Life experience 】

The game is not limited to the above activities, players can also learn and make ancient crafts, participate in traditional festival celebrations, establish a deep friendship or romantic relationship with the NPCS in the game, and deeply experience the charm of ancient culture.


【 Beautiful picture and music 】

Each frame is as delicate as a picture scroll, with melodious background music played by traditional instruments such as guzheng and flute, creating an immersive antique atmosphere.
"Eight Princess Rhapsody" is a casual game suitable for players of all ages, it is not only a game, but also a cultural journey through time and space, so that players can enjoy the fun of the game at the same time, but also feel the profound ancient Chinese civilization.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages, or should not be accessed at work: Common adult content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: ntel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz 2.71 GHz
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 有就行
